src: 他补充道：“我们现在有 4 个月大没有糖尿病的老鼠，但它们曾经得过该病。”
mt: "We now have four-month-old mice without diabetes, but they have had the disease," he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: 埃胡德·乌尔博士（新斯科舍省哈利法克斯市达尔豪西大学医学教授，加拿大糖尿病协会临床与科学部门教授）提醒，这项研究仍处在早期阶段。
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and a professor in the clinical and scientific department of the Canadian Diabetes Association, reminds that this research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: 和其他一些专家一样，他对糖尿病能否治愈持怀疑态度。他指出，这些发现与已患有 1 型糖尿病的人无关。
mt: Like some other experts, he is skeptical that diabetes can be cured. He points out that these findings are unrelated to people who already have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: 周一，瑞典学院诺贝尔文学委员会常务秘书萨拉·丹尼尔斯在瑞典广播电台的一档节目中向公众宣布，委员会因无法直接联系到鲍勃·迪伦，通知他获得了 2016 年诺贝尔文学奖，已经放弃了与他联系的尝试。
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy's Nobel Literature Committee, announced on a Swedish radio program that the committee had given up trying to contact Bob Dylan, who was awarded the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: 达尼厄斯说道：“目前我们保持按兵不动。我给他关系最好的合作者打过电话并发送了电子邮件，而且收到了对方非常友好的回复。就目前而言，这足够了。”
mt: "We're keeping our powder dry for now," Daniels said. "I've reached out to his closest collaborators and sent them emails, and I've gotten very friendly responses. That's enough for now."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: 此前，铃声 (Ring) 公司 CEO 杰米·西米诺夫曾表示，公司成立之初，他在位于车库的工作室里是听不到门铃响声的。
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff had said that when the company was first founded, he couldn't hear the doorbell ring in his garage workshop.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: 他称，他制作了一个 WiFi 门铃。
mt: He said he made a WiFi doorbell.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: 西米诺夫说，2013 年他在《创智赢家》节目中露面后，公司的销售额大增，当时节目组拒绝向这家初创公司投资。
mt: 2013, when he appeared on the show Shark Tank, sales skyrocketed, but the show's producers refused to invest in the company.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: 2017 年年末，西米诺夫出现在 QVC 电视销售频道。
mt: 2017, Westminoff appeared on the QVC television shopping channel.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: 铃声 (Ring) 公司还与竞争对手 ADT 安保公司在一起官司中达成了庭外和解。
mt: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competitor ADT Security Services out of court.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: 虽然有一种实验性疫苗看似能够降低埃博拉病毒的死亡率，但迄今为止，还没明确证明任何药物适合治疗现有的感染。
mt: While an experimental vaccine appears to reduce the death rate from Ebola, no drug has been proven effective in treating the current outbreak.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: 一种名为 ZMapp 的“抗体鸡尾酒”（多抗体联合）最初有望在该领域发挥作用，但正式研究表明，它在预防死亡方面的效果有些不尽人意。
mt: A cocktail of antibodies called ZMapp was initially thought to be a game-changer in the field, but formal research showed it had little effect in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: 在 PALM 实验中，ZMapp 用作参照。也就是科学家将其作为基线，把其他三种治疗方法与之作比较。
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a reference. In other words, scientists used it as a baseline and compared the other three treatments to it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: 美国体操协会对美国奥委会的信函表示支持，并接受奥运会大家庭的严格要求，即为所有运动员营造一个安全的训练环境。
mt: The USA Gymnastics letter to the USOC expressed support for the strict requirements of the Olympic family to create a safe training environment for all athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: 我们同意美国奥委会的声明，与其吊销执照，不如在我们组织内部继续推进有意义的变革，可能更有利于维护运动员和俱乐部的利益及其运动。
mt: We agree with the statement of the USOC and rather than revoking our license, we will continue to pursue meaningful reforms within our organization that may be more beneficial to the athletes and clubs and their sport.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: 根据美国体操协会支持的一项独立调查，我们也许能够得知，幸存者勇敢曝光的、拉里·纳萨尔的大规模性侵行为，为什么在这么长时间内都没有被发现。此外，协会还表示会做出必要和适当的整改。
mt: According to an independent investigation supported by the U.S. Gymnastics Association, we may be able to learn why Larry Nassar's widespread sexual abuse was not discovered for so long, and the association also said it will make necessary and appropriate changes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: 美国体操协会和美国奥委会有一个共同的目标，那就是尽可能保证体操运动和其他运动的安全性，让运动员在安全、积极和充满支持的环境中追求他们的梦想。
mt: The USA Gymnastics and the USOC have a common goal of ensuring the safety of gymnastics and other sports, allowing athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and supportive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: 20 世纪 60 年代，布热津斯基先是为约翰·福特·肯尼迪效力，担任他的顾问，后来又为林登·贝恩斯·约翰逊政府工作。
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski first served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy, and later worked for the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: 在 1976 年总统选举期间，他为卡特提供了对外政策方面的建议，随后在 1977 到 1981 年接替亨利·基辛格担任国家安全顾问 (NSA) 。
mt: 1976 presidential election, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and then served as NSA from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: 身为国家安全顾问，他曾协助卡特处理诸多国际事务，例如 1978 年签署《戴维营协议》；在20 世纪 70 年代末实现美中关系正常化；1979 年导致伊朗人质危机的伊朗革命；1979 年苏联入侵阿富汗。
mt: As national security adviser, he helped Carter deal with a number of international issues, including the signing of the 1978 Camp David Accords; the normalization of U.S.-China relations in the late 1970s; the 1979 Iranian Revolution that led to the Iran hostage crisis; and the 1979 Soviet invasion of Afghanistan.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: 这部由瑞恩·高斯林 (Ryan Gosling) 和艾玛·斯通 (Emma Stone) 主演的电影获得了各大奖项的提名。
mt: This film starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone has been nominated for many awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: 高斯林和斯通分别获得了最佳男主角和最佳女主角的提名。
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and best actress respectively.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: 其他提名包括最佳影片、最佳导演、最佳摄影、最佳服装设计、最佳电影剪辑、最佳原创配乐、最佳艺术指导、最佳音效剪辑、最佳混音和最佳原创剧本。
mt: Other nominees include Best Picture, Best Director, Best Cinematography, Best Costume Design, Best Film Editing, Best Original Score, Best Art Direction, Best Sound Editing, Best Sound Mixing and Best Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: 该电影的两首歌曲《追梦痴子心》和《星光之城》获得了最佳原创歌曲的提名。狮门影业获得了 26 项提名，比其他任何一家工作室都要多。
mt: 2 songs from the film, "Chasing Dreamers" and "City of Stars," were nominated for best original song. Lionsgate received 26 nominations, more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: 周日晚些时候，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普通过新闻秘书发表声明，宣布美军将撤离叙利亚。
mt: On Sunday evening, U.S. President Donald Trump announced through his press secretary that U.S. troops would be withdrawn from Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: 特朗普与土耳其总统雷杰普·塔伊普·埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdoğan）通话后发表了声明。
mt: Trump and Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan spoke by phone and issued a statement.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: 该声明称，土耳其还将接管对被捕的伊斯兰国武装分子的看守任务；欧洲国家拒绝将他们遣送回国。
mt: The statement said Turkey would also take over the guarding of Islamic State militants arrested in Europe, who have refused to be sent back to their home countries.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: 这不仅证实了至少有些恐龙有羽毛——这一理论已经广为流传——而且还提供了化石通常无法提供的细节，比如颜色和三维排列。
mt: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers — a theory that has been widely circulated — but also provides details such as color and three-dimensional arrangement that fossils usually cannot provide.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: 科学家表示，这种动物的羽毛顶部为栗棕色，底部为浅色或胡萝卜色。
mt: Scientists say the animal's feathers are reddish-brown on top and light or carrot-colored on the bottom.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: 这一发现也有助于深入了解鸟类羽毛的进化。
mt: This discovery also helps to understand the evolution of bird feathers.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: 恐龙的羽毛并没有发育良好的主干——这称为“羽轴”，但还是有羽毛的其他特征，比如羽枝和羽小枝，研究人员推断羽轴的进化可能比这些其他特征晚。
mt: The dinosaur's feathers lacked a well-developed shaft — known as a rachis — but still had other features of feathers, such as branches and barbs, leading researchers to conclude that the rachis evolved later than these other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: 羽毛的结构表明它们不是用来飞行的，而是用来调节温度或炫耀的。研究人员认为，尽管这是一只年轻恐龙的尾巴，但样本显示的是成熟的羽衣，而不是幼崽的羽毛。
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests they were not used for flight, but for temperature regulation or display. Researchers say, although the specimen is from a young dinosaur, the sample shows mature feathers, not down from a hatchling.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 研究人员认为，尽管这是一只年轻恐龙的尾巴，但样本显示的是成年羽毛，而非雏龙的绒毛。
mt: The researchers believe that although the tail is from a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult feathers, not down from a hatchling.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: 昨日上午，土耳其加齐安泰普（Gaziantep）的警察总部发生了一起汽车炸弹爆炸事件，该事件导致两名警察死亡，20 余人受伤。
mt: Yesterday morning, two police officers were killed and more than 20 people were injured in a car bomb explosion at the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: 州长办公室表示，伤者中有十九人是警察。
mt: 19 of the injured were police officers, according to the governor's office.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: 警方说他们怀疑一名疑似伊斯兰国 (ISIL) 的武装分子发动了这场袭击。
mt: Police say they suspect a suspected ISIL militant carried out the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: 他们发现，太阳和其他恒星的运行原理是一样的：星系中所有恒星的活跃度都完全决定于它们的光度和自转。
mt: They found that the principle of operation of the Sun and other stars is the same: the activity of all stars in the galaxy is completely determined by their luminosity and rotation.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: 一颗恒星的罗斯贝数由其光度和旋度共同决定，与等离子体流有关。
mt: The Rossby number of a star is determined by its luminosity and rotation rate, and is related to the magnetohydrodynamic flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: 罗斯贝数越小，恒星在磁场倒转方面就越不活跃。
mt: The lower the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic field reversals.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 在旅途中，岩崎在很多场合碰到了麻烦。
mt: On the journey, Iwazaki encountered many difficulties.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: 他曾被海盗抢劫，在西藏被疯狗袭击，在尼泊尔逃婚，还曾在印度被捕。
mt: He was once robbed by pirates, attacked by a mad dog in Tibet, escaped from a marriage in Nepal, and was once arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: 802.11n 标准在 2.4Ghz 和 5.0Ghz 频率上都可运行。
mt: 802.11n can run on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: 它能向后兼容 802.11a、802.11b 和 802.11g，前提是基站要有双无线电。
mt: 802.11ac is backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radio.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: 802.11n 的速度大大快于前代技术，最大理论吞吐量可达 600Mbit/s。
mt: 802.11n is much faster than previous technologies, with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: 杜瓦尔已婚，有两个已经成年的孩子，他并没有给故事的讲述者米勒留下太大印象。
mt: Duval is married with two adult children, and he didn't leave much of an impression on the story's narrator Miller.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: 当被要求发表看法时，米勒说：“迈克在听证会上说了很多……我当时正在做准备，所以没听清他在说什么。”
mt: When asked to comment, Miller said, "Mike said a lot of things at the hearing...I was preparing at the time, so I didn't hear what he was saying."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “到 2020 年之前，我们将努力使单位国内生产总值二氧化碳排放量比 2005 年显著下降，”胡锦涛说。
mt: "By 2020, we will strive to make the per unit of GDP carbon dioxide emissions significantly lower than that of 2005," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: 他没有设定削减数额，只是表示将根据中国的经济产出来决定数额。
mt: He did not set a specific amount, but said the reduction would be based on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: 胡锦涛鼓励发展中国家“不要重走先污染后治理的老路”。
mt: Hu Jintao urged developing countries not to "repeat the old path of first polluting and then controlling."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: 他补充道，“然而，他们不应该被要求承担超出其发展阶段、责任和能力范围的义务。”
mt: "However, they should not be expected to assume obligations that are beyond their development stage, responsibility and capacity," he added.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: 伊拉克研究小组于格林尼治时间 (GMT) 今天 12 点提交了报告。
mt: The Iraqi team submitted its report at noon GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: 报告警告称，没有人能保证目前在伊拉克采取的任何行动能够阻止宗派战争、不断增长的暴力或走向混乱。
mt: The report warns that no one can guarantee that any action taken in Iraq now will prevent sectarian war, growing violence or chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: 该报告开篇呼吁美国就中东政策展开公开辩论并形成共识。
mt: The report opens by calling for an open debate and consensus on U.S. policy in the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: 该报告对行政当局目前对伊拉克政策的几乎每一个方面都提出了严厉批评，并敦促立即改变方向。
mt: The report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the administration's current policy in Iraq and urges an immediate change of course.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: 在这份报告的 78 项建议中，第一条建议是在今年年底之前采取新的外交行动，目的在于保护伊拉克的边界免受敌对势力的侵害，并与邻国重建外交关系。
mt: 78 recommendations in the report, the first recommendation is to take new diplomatic action by the end of this year to protect Iraq's borders from hostile forces and rebuild diplomatic relations with neighboring countries.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: 现任参议员、阿根廷第一夫人克里斯蒂娜·费尔南德斯·德·柯克纳 (Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner) 昨晚在距离布宜诺斯艾利斯 50 公里（31英里）的拉普拉塔市 (La Plata) 宣布了其总统竞选资格。
mt: Current Senator and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy last night in La Plata, 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: 基什内尔女士在阿根廷大剧院宣布她有意参加总统竞选，2005 年也是在这里，她作为布宜诺斯艾利斯省代表开始竞选参议员。
mt: Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Teatro Colon in Buenos Aires, where she began her campaign for senator in 2005 as a representative of the province of Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: 这场辩论是因为对卡特里娜飓风后的救济和重建支出有争议而开始的；一些财政保守派幽默地将其称为“布什的新（奥尔良）政”。
mt: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending and rebuilding after Hurricane Katrina; some fiscal conservatives humorously dubbed it "Bush's new (New) Orleans policy."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: 自由派人士对重建工作的批判主要集中在把重建合同授予了视为华盛顿内部人士的这一做法。
mt: Criticism of the rebuilding contract being awarded to a Washington insider was the main focus of the free marketeers.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: 有 400 多万人前往罗马参加葬礼。
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: 对于在圣彼得广场举行的葬礼，出席者太多了，因此不可能每个人都能进入。
mt: 由于参加在 St. Peter's Square's funeral too many, it is impossible for everyone to enter.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: 罗马各地安装了数个大型电视屏幕，供人们观看仪式。
mt: Large screens were installed in various parts of Rome to allow people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: 在意大利很多其他城市以及世界上其他地方，尤其是波兰，都设置了类似的设施，以供大量群众观看。
mt: Similar facilities have been set up in many other Italian cities and other parts of the world, especially Poland, for large crowds to watch.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: 历史学家批判了联邦调查局的过往政策，这种政策会把资源集中到容易破获的案件上，尤以偷车案件居多，目的只在于提高该机构的成功破案率。
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's past policy of concentrating resources on easy-to-crack cases, especially car thefts, in order to boost the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: 国会从 2005 财年开始资助该扫黄倡议，并规定联邦调查局 (FBI) 必须指派 10 名探员专门打击成人色情。
mt: The Congress has funded the initiative since the 2005 fiscal year and requires the FBI to assign 10 agents to combat adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: 罗宾·乌萨帕 (Robin Uthappa) 取得了本局的最高分，投出了 11 个四分球和 2 个六分球，仅投出 41 个球便赢得 70 分。
mt: Robin Uthappa scored a career-high 70 points, making 11 three-pointers and two four-pointers, on 41 shots.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: 中局击球手萨钦·坦杜尔卡和拉胡尔·德拉维德表现出色，搭档取得了 100 跑的成绩。
mt: 100-run partnership for Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: 但在队长输掉三柱门后，印度在结束这一局的比赛时只得了 36 分，输掉 7 个三柱门。
mt: But after the captain lost the three-bar gate, India only got 36 points in the end of this game, losing 7 three-bar gates.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: 美国总统乔治·沃克·布什于 11 月 16 日上午抵达新加坡，开始为期一周的亚洲之行。
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore on Monday morning for a week-long Asian tour.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: 他受到了新加坡副总理黄根成的欢迎，并与新加坡总理李显龙探讨了贸易和恐怖主义问题。
mt: He was welcomed by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Teo Chee Hean and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: 在经过一周的中期选举失利后，布什向听众讲述了亚洲贸易扩张的形势。
mt: After a week of midterm election losses, Bush told his audience about the Asian trade expansion.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: 周二，总理斯蒂芬·哈珀（ Stephen Harper ）在其办公室与新民主党党魁杰克·林顿（ Jack Layton ）举行 25 分钟的会议后，已经同意将政府的《清洁空气法》送交一个多党委员会审查，然后再进行二读。
mt: On Monday, Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's Clean Air Act to a multi-party committee for review before a second reading after a 25-minute meeting with New Democratic Party Leader Jack Layton in his office.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: “莱顿 (Layton) 在与首相会面期间要求修改保守党的环境法案，他要求‘彻底重写’保守党的环境法案。”
mt: “Layton met with the prime minister and asked for changes to the Conservative Party’s environmental bill, asking for a ‘complete rewrite’ of the Conservative Party’s environmental bill.”
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: 自从联邦政府介入接管塔斯马尼亚州德文波特的默西医院的资金后，州政府和一些联邦议员批评此举是 11 月联邦大选前的噱头。
mt: Since the federal government stepped in to take over funding for the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, the state government and some federal MPs have criticized the move as an election stunt ahead of the November federal election.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: 但澳大利亚总理约翰•霍华德 (John Howard) 表示，该法案只是为了通过额外拨付 4500 万澳元来防止医院设施被塔斯马尼亚政府降级。
mt: But Australian Prime Minister John Howard said the bill was only to provide an additional $450 million to prevent hospital facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: 最新公报显示，海平面的读数表明已经发生过海啸。帕果帕果和纽埃岛附近确切记录了海啸活动的发生。
mt: The latest bulletin shows that sea level readings indicate a tsunami has occurred.  The exact timing of the tsunami activity was recorded in Pago Pago and Niue Island.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: 汤加 (Tonga) 没有重大损失或人员伤亡报告，但电力暂时中断。据报道，停电让汤加当局无法收到太平洋海啸警报中心 (PTWC) 发出的海啸警报。
mt: Tonga has reported no major damage or injuries, but power is temporarily out. The Tongan government was unable to receive a tsunami warning from the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center (PTWC) due to the power outage.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: 尽管警报已解除，坐落于夏威夷海岸线或附近的 14 所学校在整个周三都关闭了。
mt: 14 schools along or near the coast of Hawaii were closed for the entire Wednesday, despite the all-clear.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: 美国总统乔治·沃克·布什对这一公告表示支持。
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush expressed support for the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: "布什政府发言人戈登·约翰德罗 (Gordon Johndroe) 称朝鲜的承诺是"朝着实现朝鲜半岛可核查的无核化目标迈出的重要一步"。"
mt: "Gordon Johndroe, a spokesman for the Bush administration, called the North Korean pledge 'an important step toward the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.'"
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: 亚热带风暴杰瑞 (Jerry) 今天在大西洋形成，这是大西洋飓风季节中第十个被命名的风暴。
mt: Tropical Storm Jerry formed in the Atlantic today, the tenth named storm of the Atlantic hurricane season.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: 国家飓风中心 (NHC) 表示，目前“杰瑞”对陆地没有威胁。
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said the storm poses no threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: 美国陆军工兵部队估计，6 英寸的降雨量就可能冲垮之前损坏的堤坝。
mt: 6 inches of rain could wash away the damaged levees, according to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: “卡特里娜”飓风来袭时，第九区洪水水位一度高达 20 英尺，由于附近的防洪堤已经被淹没，目前水位已达齐腰深度。
mt: 9th Ward residents are bracing for the worst as the water level rose to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, with the levee already submerged, the water is now up to their waist.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: 在一处 100 英尺宽的河段，水即将溢出堤坝。
mt: 100-foot wide section of the river is about to overflow the levee.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: 共享资源管理员亚当·库尔登 (Adam Cuerden) 上个月在接受维基新闻 (Wikinews) 采访时表达了他对删除相关内容的不满。
mt: Adam Cuerden, a Wikimedia Commons administrator, expressed his displeasure with the deletion of the content in an interview with Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “说穿了，他[威尔斯]从一开始就对我们撒谎。首先，他表现得好像是出于法律原因才这么做。其次，他先是假装听取我们的意见，然后直接删除了这些艺术作品。”
mt: "In the end, he [Wells] lied to us from the beginning. First, he acted as if he was doing it for legal reasons. Second, he pretended to listen to our opinions, then he deleted these artworks directly."
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: 由于民愤，目前正在针对该网站的性内容起草相关政策。该网站拥有数百万个获得公共传播许可的媒体。
mt: Due to public outrage, the government is currently drafting policies against the website's content. The website has millions of media with public distribution licenses.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: 完成的工作大多是理论性的，但编写程序的目的，是为了模拟对人马座星系的观测。
mt: The work is largely theoretical, but the purpose of writing the code is to simulate observations of the Andromeda galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: 该团队正在寻找的效应可能是由星系暗物质和银河系暗物质之间的潮汐力引起的。
mt: The team is looking for an effect that may be caused by tidal forces between dark matter in the galaxy and dark matter in the galaxy cluster.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: 就像月球对地球施加拉力，引起潮汐一样，银河系也对人马座星系施加着作用力。
mt: Just as the moon exerts a gravitational pull on Earth, causing tides, the Milky Way exerts a pull on the Andromeda galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: 科学家们可以得出结论，暗物质对其他暗物质的影响方式与普通物质相同。
mt: Scientists can conclude that dark matter interacts with other dark matter in the same way that ordinary matter does.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: 该理论认为，一个星系周围的大多数暗物质都处在星系周围的某种光环中，由许多小粒子组成。
mt: The theory suggests that most of the dark matter around a galaxy is in a ring around the galaxy, made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: 电视报道显示，有白烟从工厂里冒出。
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming out of the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: 当地政府警告核电站附近的居民，要待在室内，关掉空调，不要喝自来水。
mt: Local government warned residents near the nuclear power plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning, and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: 日本原子能机构表示，核电站检测出了放射性物质铯和碘。
mt: The Japan Atomic Energy Agency said it detected radioactive substances cesium and iodine.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: 有关部门推测，这表明现场储存铀燃料的容器可能已经破裂，并且正在泄漏。
mt: Officials speculate this may indicate that the container holding uranium fuel at the site has ruptured and is leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: 托尼·莫尔博士在南非夸祖鲁-纳塔尔省发现了这种广泛耐药结核病 (XDR-TB)。
mt: Dr. Tony Moll was the first to discover this widespread drug-resistant tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal province.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: 他在一次采访中表示，这个新变种“非常令人不安和担忧，因为它的致死率非常高。”
mt: He said in an interview that this new variant "is very concerning and worrying because it has a very high mortality rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: 莫尔 (Moll) 博士认为，有些病人可能是在医院感染了病菌，而且至少有两名病人是医院的医护人员。
mt: Dr. Moll believes some patients may have contracted the infection in the hospital, and at least two of the patients were hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
